tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE LandUseForecasting (id INT, location VARCHAR(255), year INT, land_use_type VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE land_use_forecast (
  forecast_id INT,
  model_id INT,
  year INT,
  land_use_category VARCHAR(50),
  projected_area_ha FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE land_use_scenarios (
    scenario_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    scenario_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    historical_data JSONB NOT NULL,
    predicted_data JSONB NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE land_use_types (
    type_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    type_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE model_parameters (
    parameter_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    parameter_value FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE spatial_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    coordinates POINT NOT NULL,
    region VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
